Detailed Description

Function Documentation

void checkForFreezeCondition (  ) 

This method checks the input devices and enables or disables freeze appropriately.

Debug geometry will be reset every frame, unless freeze is enabled. Freeze is enabled by clicking the middle mouse button. Once freeze is enabled, all geometry add / delete calls are ignored. This allows you to examine a single frame of debug geometry.

To unfreeze the debug geometry, press the escape key.
